transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller to the specified address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another using the allowance mechanism.

approve.description: Sets the allowance for a spender to spend tokens on behalf of the caller.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places the token uses.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens held by a specific address.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with specified parameters.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made.

Transfer.description: Emitted when a transfer of tokens occurs.
